column4: How can i make my ubuntu machine not display real time on the physical box when i am connected via VNC.
or even diable mouse on phyiscal machine when connected remotely,
I don't understand...if you don't want real time why use vnc?
you need to fetch it from the NoMachine website...there is a freenx in the repos...but it isn't being maintained as I understand it...the NoMachine version is much 'improved'
